name: rexaddd
params: class c0, class c1, wff w0
body: |- wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, cxad, c1), co(c0, caddc, c1)))

stmt.origin: syl2anc(w0, wceq(co(c0, cxad, c1), co(c0, caddc, c1)), wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, cxad, c1), co(c0, caddc, c1)))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cr))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cr))
-| wi(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wceq(co(c0, cxad, c1), co(c0, caddc, c1)))

-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cr))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cr))
-| wi(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wceq(co(c0, cxad, c1), co(c0, caddc, c1)))

body.origin: |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wceq(co(c0, cxad, c1), co(c0, caddc, c1)))

-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cr))

comment: The extended real addition operation when both arguments are real. Deduction version of ~ rexadd . (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 24-Dec-2020.)
